text: Kerewan is one of eight Local Government Areas (LGA) in the Gambia. It is north of the Gambia River. The city of Kerewan is the headquarters of the North Bank Region. In 2013 about 220,000 lived in the LGA. Of those, about 200,000 lived in the city. Category:Cities in the Gambia Category:Local Government Areas of the Gambia
title: Kerewan (Gambia)
